target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXCodeGenOptions.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXDiagnostic.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXDiagnosticIDs.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXDiagnosticOptions.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXFileEntry.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXFileManager.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXIdentifierTable.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXLangOptions.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXSourceLocation.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXSourceManager.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXTargetInfo.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXTargetOptions.cpp)
